page.title: 16ENTERTAINMENT
page.content:
Major entertainment is not available in MALPAS. Professional theatre is within easy travelling distance by car or public transport. CHESTER> theatre, 2cinemas, dancing,clubs. (15 miles from Malpas) WREXHAM> cinema dancing (10 miles from Malpas) CREWE.> theatre, cinema. dancing clubs (12 miles from Malpas) MOLD theatre (25 miles from Malpas).
For RECREATION in Malpas see page 18 Three major centres are within considered travelling distance from Malpas: MANCHESTER> theatre (ballet, opera avd drama) LIVERPOOL and BIRMINGHAM all offer quality productions . Each is about 50 miles from Malpas.
